refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the direction vector using the current azimuth and elevation (AE).

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Returns the direction vector using the current azimuth and elevation as input. If the -i option is used the commmand will return the inverse directional vector. See also the ae2dir, dir2ae and qvrot commands.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the viewdir command to get the direction vector.

example.title: Find the current direction vector.
example.para: Returns the direction vector using the current azimuth and elevation.
